title: RP for a skin
body:
Hello, Im from EUW and I write this here because this forum is much more active than others. My problem is: I have 44rp and if I buy a prepaid card I would have 1624rp but I want to buy infernal nasus (1820rp). Would riot give me the rp left (196) to buy the skin if I draw something and send it to them? 

Thanks.

replies.body: They typically only give anything sub 80 from what most people I know have experienced.

196 RP eh? That's a decent chunk of RP, so I'm not sure we'd be able to manage to help out with that much. If you need a lower amount in the future, feel free to reach out in a [**support ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we'll see what we can do. No promises, though! :P
